item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: you need to visit Cursed Filthy Noodle Shop to get access to Hacking. you are then given a target and you have to find what field they're on and attempt to hack them (it gives them -1 str against phases) if you successfully hack them you have drained them.

item.title: Draining Players
item.content:encoded: How I Drain another players? Trap-chan is really talking about Drain or is just Bingo?
